p: The introduction of an arbovirus in an area with the presence of vectors must be treated as a relevant event [ 2]. In March 2019, an outbreak of dengue-like illness with 20-suspected cases of DENV infection was reported in a rural area of Linhares municipality, in Esp√≠rito Santo state, Brazil. This study investigated this unexpected autochthonous rural occurrence, establishing the vectors and viruses possibly involved in the transmission.
